channel.title: ~Unable to connect to server~
channel.description:
I am trying to run my own server but i am having troubles getting it to connect... I have port forwarded and i have a no-ip... also i have jdk6 ver.26... Thanks any help is appreciated
~Devin97

item.title: ~Unable to connect to server~
item.dc:creator: @devin97 devin97
item.description:
@devin97 wrote:

runewings317:

Make sure your Firewall is open to that port.

Done that and still isnt working…

[quote=“Anc13ntsIsBack, post:3, topic:401569”]Is the server running on the port you forwarded? Also is the client set to the IP & the port you forwarded?
If you still need help after this, private message me your msn.

(& Yes, like he said above. If you have your firewall turned on add it to the exception list).[/quote]
Yes they are both set to the port and i sent you my msn…

Read full topic

item.title: ~Unable to connect to server~

item.description:
@Anc13ntsIsBack wrote:

Is the server running on the port you forwarded? Also is the client set to the IP & the port you forwarded?
If you still need help after this, private message me your msn.
